activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
Laserbeam Software is an application service provider for our customers who upload their compensation, performance and other data (including personal information of employees,) to the Laserbeam Software-hosted environment. Once the data is stored, our customers access our solution and their data for salary/merit increases, performance and bonus purposes. Individuals involved in these compensation activities interact directly with Laserbeam’s customers, rather than with Laserbeam Software. Laserbeam Software is a data “processor” for our customers who operate as “controllers” of personal information. Additionally, Laserbeam Software maintains personal information pertaining to our employees and candidates for employment and persons who have submitted their personal data in order to receive information about the Laserbeam Software products.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data Covered: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed Data, Human Resources Data
recoursemech: JAMS Safe Harbor for non-human resources data. EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for human resources data only.
